method.name: Intuitionistic Fuzzy Version of K-Nearest Neighbors classifier

reference.ref: S. Hadjitodorov, An intuitionistic fuzzy version of the nearest prototype classification method, based on a moving-of-pattern procedure, International Journal of General Systems, vol. 30, no. 2, pp. 155-165, 2000.

generalDescription.howWork: IFV-NP is a prototypical version of IFSKNN, in which after obtaining the prototypes an iterative procedure is carried out to adjust the degrees of membership and nonmembership in accordance with the distances of each instance to the center of the classes.

parameterSpec.param: Threshold: Threshold parameter for the prototype adjusting procedure.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: IFV_NP-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.14909090909090908 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.1027875929098369 Correctly classified: 0.850909090909091 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Summary of data, Classifiers: appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8421052631578947 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8421052631578947 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8526315789473684 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8421052631578947 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.8526315789473684 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8541666666666666 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.84375 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.8333333333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.8125 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.16246710526315788 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.016991160282314656 Correctly classified: 0.8375328947368421 Global N/C: 0.0
